thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden gem
thread.title_full: Hidden gem - Review of Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Manda886
title: Hidden gem
text: Fantastic hotel, upscale furnishings, convienent location, and a great deal especially if you have a car. Parking was reduced for guests and while there was no valet parking, it was easy enough if you knew where you were going. The staff were also all so friendly and helpful. Our favorite was Reuben, who unfortunately had to deal with me being quite heated upon arrival. Reuben was nothing but professional and so patient. We would come back just for him :)
